name: Bubble Shooter - Aim & Shoot
description:
Bubble Shooter - Aim & Shoot! is classical bubble shooting game where is marvelous and fun gameplay!

Challenge people around the world! Play for free and enjoy the magic of miraculous bubbles!

TARGET
• Try to drop a large number of bubbles at once.

SCORING
• The value of the bubble on the board is 10, 20, 30, 40, etc...
• The value of the dropped bubble is 100, 110, 120, 130, etc...

BONUS
• Clear all the bubbles!

GAMETIME
• Three minutes of game time.

Powered by Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

If you have any questions or proposals to the game, we hope you contact us at support@ccbrothers.com
If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
